summary: I’m just going to go ahead and say it.
body:
I’m just going to go ahead and say it.

To all those artist out there who don’t want their art reposted, I have something devestatinh to say. Your art, you know it, is constantly reposted on Pinterest.

Sadly my favorite artists, and most likely yours, who don’t deserve this, have their art reposted on Pinterest. Probably other platforms too.

And you reposters. By saying: Well, if they didn’t want their art reposted, they shouldn’t have posted it on the internet. Makes completely no sense. To me that sounds equivalent to: Well, if you didn’t want that grade , you shouldn’t have turned it in. Which still doesn’t make sense. Artist work hard on their art, and they deserve to be able to post their art with no fear of someone reposting it. With/without permission.

Respect artists’ rules. It really sucks when you can snatch away someone’s work like that. Imagine being in their shoes.

Please reblog to get this around to artists. We need to stop reposting with no artists’ consent.

blog.name: purple-img
blog.title: an attempt at art (aaaa)
blog.description: mikey | 18 | digital artist | trying his best

summary: a cute triad of succs!! 3 different hues because i just love color palletes like these??? i wanted to try something different...
caption:
a cute triad of succs!!

3 different hues because i just love color palletes like these???

i wanted to try something different from my usual style of haphazardly coloring and shading. i really took my time with this one. i hope you enjoy! these will be available on some sort of art site eventually. redbubble has suspended 2 accounts of mine in the last hour, simply because i tried to upload these. 

teepublics got my back. im so done with redbubble D: teepublic seems a lot more simple than redbubble anyway.

heres a small album of all 3 designs! ill be uploading them slowly as to not make the site think im spamming haha.
